article_title: AARP alum to run White House aging conference
article_text:
For one year, Nora Super was a lobbyist for Kaiser Permanente. (AP photo/Pablo Martinez Monsivais)

The Obama administration has named Nora Super to be executive director of the 2015 White House Conference on Aging.

Super will have a chance to shape debate about retirement income planning and post-retirement health care issues, including long-term care (LTC) planning issues.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: Nora Super was the advocacy group's chief lobbyist while PPACA was being created.

article_summary:
(AP photo/Pablo Martinez Monsivais)The Obama administration has named Nora Super to be executive director of the 2015 White House Conference on Aging.
Super will have a chance to shape debate about retirement income planning and post-retirement health care issues, including long-term care (LTC) planning issues.
For one year, Nora Super was a lobbyist for Kaiser Permanente.
